data.name: Who Wants To Destroy An Alien
data.detailed_description:
Synopsis

The universally famous TV Show, Who Wants To Destroy An Alien, is hosting its cyclical 'Rumble Royale' event! Combatants from all over the Universe have arrived in good sport, to get their wish granted or die trying! Of the hundreds of degenerates who arrive seeking fulfillment, thirteen stand apart as the potential victors. Who will win? That's for you to decide.



Key Features:
  • Experience a Battle Royale delivered in event-driven, classic, JRPG style!
  • Choose from 13 characters each with their own psychology, wish, and unique ending.
  • Place Traps, Sabotage Tech, or just Fight. Approach situations based on your character's strengths.
  • Like MOBA games, build your character your way. Tweak passives, nitpick skills, and select the devices for your playstyle.
  • A regenerating energy system for ground combat. Balance your energy. Choose your skills wisely.
  • Visit various locations within this dystopian sector, such as Junkyards, Pawn Shops, Fast Foods, Workshops, and Public Transportation Stations!
  • 2 Different Combat Modes: Ground Combat & Ship Combat (both shown in Pre-Alpha video)!
  • Upgrade System for your Weapon, Armor, and Ship
  • Ditch your ship and take Public Transportation all the way!
  • Board enemy ships, kill them, and take their ships (just like Battle Royale should be).
  • Make your way to the final arena for the final showdown.
  • The later you arrive, the stronger the remaining combatants. The sooner you arrive, the more of them.
  • Event-driven storyline, based on how you choose to explore the map.
  • Twisted aliens get twisted endings.

data.short_description: Battle Royale meets JRPG in this Cyberpunk, All-Villain TV Show to see who gets their wish granted! Hehe. "Granted"... By a sadistic host.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP+
  • Processor: 1 GHz Intel or AMD Processor
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X Snow Leopard 10.6 or later
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo or newer
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 2006 or newer graphics card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any distribution built for x86 or x64 processors
  • Processor: 1 GHz Intel or AMD Processor
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains depictions of violence against fictional, humanoid entities and sexual references throughout the fictional environment, such as graffiti of vulgar statements and fictional product advertisements.

This game will also contain mature language in the text and voice acting, with an option to disable swearing. Disabling sweating will change the phrases, rather than eliminate any content (similar to music industry dubs over explicit content).

Please note that some character endings may depict violent occurrences that are not for the faint of heart, such as limb removal by crowd (don't worry, no spoilers, this is just an example and not an actual character ending).

User discretion is advised.
